name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Actors
description: This is a repository of actors APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: Atlassian
apis.description: Millions of users globally rely on Atlassian products every day for improving software development, project management, collaboration, and code quality.

apis.name: The TVDB
apis.description: TheTVDB.com is a community driven database of television shows. All content and images on the site have been contributed by the sites users; the site uses moderated editing to maintain its own standards. The database schema and website are open source under the GNU General Public License.
